name: Rewildr
description:
Welcome to Rewildr! Play as a cute lil forest spirit and bring nature back to a landscape devoid of life. 

Rewildr was developed in a week during Global Game Jam 2023. We would like to support rewilding initiatives in real life, if you enjoyed our game, please consider donating to a nature conservation charity near you :)

Controls

WASD - to move

Space - to plant

Scroll wheel - to select item

1-7 - hot key item
